A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The Last Jedi will be the last Star Wars film I watch.

If you grew up with the original trilogy and the characters still hold a place in your heart I strongly recommend you do not watch this movie.

I left the cinema feeling old\, tired and very sad. To be brutally honest I was emotionally crushed by this movie and it's just not what I was expecting nor what I wanted at Christmas time from Star Wars. I'm a left-wing activist in the UK so don't think I'm hating on it because of its progressive values - that was all fine. It's the (mis)treatment of the old characters that ruined my evening.
